content: {"name": "Berean Outreach Ministries Center", "alternate_name": "", "description": "only serve ZIP Codes for 30314, 30318, AND 30331", "email": "", "url": "http://atlantaberean.com/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "312 Hamilton E Holmes Drive Northwest", "address_2": null, "city": "Collier Heights", "state_province": "GA", "postal_code": "30318", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 33.7639824, "longitude": -84.47054519999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(470) 225-7202", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Open to all"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: Once a week "}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Diapers and Clothes upon availability"}]}
